TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Figure extends System.Windows.Documents.AnchoredBlock

summary.span: An inline-level flow content element used to host a figure.

span.span: An inline-level flow content element used to host a figure.

summary.span: A *figure* is a portion of flow content with placement properties that can be customized independently from the primary content flow within a .

span.span: A *figure* is a portion of flow content with placement properties that can be customized independently from the primary content flow within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需有關內容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 或項目通常用於反白顯示，或強調部分內容、 影像或其他內容中主要的內容流程支援的主機，或將鬆散相關內容，例如廣告。 or elements are often used to highlight or accentuate portions of content, to host supporting images or other content within the main content flow, or to inject loosely related content such as advertisements. 和數種方式不同，而且會用於不同的案例。 and differ in several ways and are used for different scenarios. **圖表：****Figure:** - 可以定位︰可以設定其水平和垂直錨點，將它固定在頁面、內容、資料行或段落的相對位置。Can be positioned: You can set its horizontal and vertical anchors to dock it relative to the page, content, column or paragraph. 您也可以使用其和屬性，以指定任意位移。You can also use its and properties to specify arbitrary offsets. - 可調整大小時到一個以上的資料行： 您可以設定高度和寬度頁面、 內容或資料行的高度或寬度的倍數。Is sizable to more than one column: You can set height and width to multiples of page, content or column height or width. 請注意，如果是頁面及內容，倍數不能大於 1。Note that in the case of page and content, multiples greater than 1 are not allowed. 例如，您可以設定的寬度0.5 頁面 」、 「 0.25 內容 」 或 「 2 的資料行 」。For example, you can set the width of a to be "0.5 page" or "0.25 content" or "2 Column". 您也可以將高度和寬度設為絕對像素值。You can also set height and width to absolute pixel values. - 未編頁： 如果內部內容未符合內部，它會呈現未符合任何內容的其餘內容將會遺失Does not paginate: If the content inside a does not fit inside the , it will render whatever content does fit and the remaining content is lost **Floater：****Floater:** - 無法定位，但會轉譯任何可用的空間。Cannot be positioned and will render wherever space can be made available for it. 您不能設定位移或錨點。You cannot set the offset or anchor a . - 無法調整為多個資料行： 根據預設，在一個資料行的大小。Cannot be sized to more than one column: By default, sizes at one column. 它有屬性可以設為絕對像素值，但如果這個值是大於則會忽略它的一個資料行寬度] 和 [浮動器的大小調整為一個資料行。It has a property that can be set to an absolute pixel value, but if this value is greater than one column width it is ignored and the floater is sized at one column. 大小不超過一個資料行藉由設定正確的像素寬度，但調整大小不是資料行相關，因此 「 0.5Column"不是有效的運算式寬度。You can size it to less than one column by setting the correct pixel width, but sizing is not column-relative, so "0.5Column" is not a valid expression for width. 沒有高度屬性，而且無法設定高度時，它的高度取決於內容 has no height property and it's height cannot be set, it’s height depends on the content - 編頁： 如果在指定的寬度其內容延伸到 1 個以上的資料行高度，浮動器會中斷，並會分頁至下一個資料行，下一個頁面等。 paginates: If its content at its specified width extends to more than 1 column height, floater breaks and paginates to the next column, the next page, etc. 若要將獨立內容適合您想要用來控制大小和定位和確信內容將放在指定的大小。 is a good place to put standalone content where you want to control the size and positioning, and are confident that the content will fit in the specified size. 是將多個自由的內容流程類似於主頁面內容，但是它分隔的好地方。 is a good place to put more free-flowing content that flows similar to the main page content, but is separated from it. ## Examples 下列範例會定義，同時包含和項目。The following example defines a that contains both and elements. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterFigureXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_floaterfigurexaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： Flowdocument 中及數字的 FlowDocument](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "螢幕擷取畫面： Flowdocument 中及數字的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument](~/add/media/floaterfigure.png "Screenshot: Floaters and Figures in a FlowDocument")

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this figure can delay its placement in the flow of content.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this figure can delay its placement in the flow of content.

value.span: * * true * * 如果此圖中可能會延遲位置;否則，* * false * *。

span.span: **true** if this figure can delay placement; otherwise, **false**.
The default value is **true**.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the distance that a is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the distance that a is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction.

value.span: 在水平方向相對於基準的位移距離，以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

span.span: The distance that a is offset from its baseline in the horizontal direction, in device independent pixels.
The default value is **0.0**.
